duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and deliver technical solutions for large-scale digital transformation projects
Implement end-to-end data pipelines for streaming and batch integrations using leading public cloud data platforms
Work with code repositories and continuous integration
Develop efficient and complex queries using strong SQL knowledge
Develop, maintain, and troubleshoot complex ETL processes using Microsoft SSIS
Design and implement data ingest, validation, and enrichment pipelines
Work with Snowflakes and Tableau/ Power BI for data analysis and visualization
Certification for any of the cloud services like AWS, Google Cloud, Azure
Logical programming in Spark/ PySpark/ Scala

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
